order_tracking_history_details_FRAUD_MAN: An additional processing time is required. It is usually around 48 hours. Our customer support team may contact you.
order_tracking_history_details_FRAUD_REF: The data associated with this order does not have the necessary guarantees for the transaction. Please renew it using another payment method.
order_tracking_history_details_INVOICE_S: You can view and download it in the Billing section.
order_tracking_history_details_custom_pa:
Your order is awaiting payment. There may be two reasons for this:
  • you have generated a purchase order without paying for it, or
  • you have paid for this order via cheque or bank transfer. An additional processing time is required.
order_tracking_estimated_delivery_time_i: This period is an estimate only. Some factors may result in the delivery time taking longer.
order_tracking_error: An error has occurred retrieving the order.
order_tracking_bare_metal_delivery_delay: Due to current demand, delivery times for our Bare Metal services may be longer than usual. Our teams are fully mobilised, and we are working hard to deliver to you as soon as possible.
